description: watercolor like image of part of building facade; tall section to right "GALLERIE"; colors browns, blue and some pink; below image in black “DIE DIELE: DIE THUR DES EMPFANGS-RAUMS: DER KAMIN:" title upper left; number "12" upper right; below image: "ART .
